name: Magic Jo Roguelike
description:
I made this game following the Unity Learn 2D Roguelike tutorial : 2D Roguelike - Unity Learn

Assets used :

  • 2D Roguelike | Tutorials | Unity Asset Store
  • Character and Enemy Sprites by Alfredo Villegas:  https://jo4blue.wixsite.com/portfolio

Link to GitHub: https://github.com/jronquillo-main/Magic-Jo-Roguelike
